A

ACTION_C2DM_RECEIVE - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver.LQDeviceMessagingReceiver
Broadcast Action: A push message was received.
ACTION_C2DM_REGISTER - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver.LQDeviceMessagingReceiver
Register to receive push notifications.
ACTION_C2DM_REGISTRATION - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver.LQDeviceMessagingReceiver
Broadcast Action: A push registration result.
ACTION_C2DM_UNREGISTER - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver.LQDeviceMessagingReceiver
Unregister from further push notifications.
ACTION_DEFAULT - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.service.LQService
When given this action the LQService will attempt to restore a saved tracking session or, lacking a saved session, will create a new anonymous user account.
ACTION_FOREGROUND - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.service.LQService
When provided this action the LQService will attempt to invoke Service.startForeground(int, android.app.Notification).
ACTION_LOCATION_CHANGED - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver.LQBroadcastReceiver
Broadcast Action: The location tracker service has received a new location from its LocationManager.
ACTION_LOCATION_UPLOADED - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver.LQBroadcastReceiver
Broadcast Action: The location tracker service has successfully pushed all batched location fixes to the server.
ACTION_PUSH_MESSAGE_RECEIVED - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver.LQBroadcastReceiver
Broadcast Action: A push message was received.
ACTION_REQUEST_LOCATION_FIX - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.service.LQService
When given this action the LQService will ask the tracker to temporarily run in a higher accuracy mode.
ACTION_SEND_PUSH_TOKEN - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.service.LQService
When given this action the LQService will attempt to send the provided push token to the server.
ACTION_SET_TRACKER_PROFILE - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.service.LQService
When given this action the LQService will notify the tracker that it should begin using the given LQTracker.LQTrackerProfile.
ACTION_TRACKER_PROFILE_CHANGED - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.receiver.LQBroadcastReceiver
Broadcast Action: The tracker service has switched to a new tracking profile.
ACTION_UPDATE_NOTIFICATION - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.service.LQService
When given this action the LQService will attempt to update the foreground notification with the given extras.
ACTION_UPLOAD_BATCHED_LOCATIONS - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.service.LQService
When given this action the LQService will attempt to immediately flush any batched location fixes to the server.

NO_CLOSE - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.util.Base64
Flag to pass to Base64OutputStream to indicate that it should not close the output stream it is wrapping when it itself is closed.
NO_PADDING - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.util.Base64
Encoder flag bit to omit the padding '=' characters at the end of the output (if any).
NO_WRAP - Static variable in class com.geoloqi.android.sdk.util.Base64
Encoder flag bit to omit all line terminators (i.e., the output will be on one long line).
